## RequestHandler.handleRequest() method

Handle the give request with provided context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleRequest(request: Request, context: Context): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | Request | Request to be handled |
|  context | [Context](./stentor-models.context.md) | Context the request is handled within |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

Promise that returns void when the execution is complete
